titleStmt.title: At the Golden Ball in St. Christophers Church-Yard in Thread-Needle-street, near Stocks Market. You may have a certain, safe and private cure for any venereal pox or clap, by a physician, not us'd to make himself publick, nor had not now, only to oppose the ignorant, and prevent the ruin of such as labour under this disaster: ...

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Items at reel positions E8:2[184], E8:2[188], E8:2[222] appear to be variant settings and are punctuated differently.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
